title: Ireland's new national air quality forecast goes live today - TheJournal.ie
summary: The Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) has launched a national air quality forecast online, allowing users to view daily air quality predictions for up to three days. The forecast maps are based on the Air Quality Index for Health (AQIH), which indicates air quality levels and potential health impacts. The forecast aims to help people plan outdoor activities to reduce exposure to poor air quality and provides a valuable resource for policymakers to analyze air quality in Ireland.
